tasks.explanation: Retrieve van keys at the start of each shift to ensure vehicle access for food pickup and delivery operations.

tasks.task: Green bins picked up from farm shed
tasks.explanation: Collect empty green bins from the farm shed to prepare for incoming food collection and sorting.
Clean the farm shed floor and report any food items that were not picked up during collection.
Record temperature readings for all refrigeration units to ensure food safety compliance.
Organize incoming food items by type and apply proper labeling for identification and tracking.
Remove any food items from shelves that are not specifically labeled for kitchen use.
Log incoming food quantities in the app by weighing and recording all received items.
Log outgoing food quantities in the app by weighing and recording all distributed items.

tasks.task: Grocery in yellow bins and labeled
tasks.explanation: Place grocery items in designated yellow bins and ensure proper labeling for organization.

tasks.task: Farm food out to farm shed
tasks.explanation: Transfer farm food items to the farm shed, coordinated by driver or coordinator.
Clean and sanitize all food bins to maintain hygiene standards and prevent contamination.
Remove all garbage and debris from sink areas to maintain clean working conditions.
Remove all recycling materials and garbage from the facility to maintain cleanliness.
Clean and sanitize all counter surfaces to maintain food safety and hygiene standards.

tasks.task: Cooler and freezer locked and lights off
tasks.explanation: Secure all refrigeration units and turn off lights to ensure proper security and energy efficiency.
Clean all floor surfaces by sweeping debris and mopping with appropriate cleaning solutions.

tasks.task: Mop rinsed, bucket emptied, mop drying in ringer
tasks.explanation: Clean mop equipment, empty cleaning bucket, and set mop to dry in the ringer for next use.
Organize and stack all cardboard boxes in a neat, organized manner for recycling or reuse.
Return van keys to their designated location at the end of each shift.
Secure the facility by activating alarm system and ensuring all locks are properly engaged.
Secure the facility gate to prevent unauthorized access during closed hours.

tasks.task: Walls and cooler and freezer doors washed
tasks.explanation: Clean walls and refrigeration unit doors to maintain hygiene and appearance standards.
Package Cobs bread items in appropriate bags for distribution and storage.
Check and record inventory levels for garbage bags, gloves, soap, bleach, floor cleaner, paper towels, bread bags, twist ties, masking tape, pens, pencils, and sharpies.

tasks.task: Counters and shelves organized and washed
tasks.explanation: Clean and organize all counter surfaces and storage shelves to maintain order and hygiene.

tasks.task: Recycling and garbage bins washed out
tasks.explanation: Clean recycling and garbage bins in the mop sink to prevent odors and maintain cleanliness.
Clean floor surfaces in cooler and freezer units to remove debris and maintain cleanliness.
Clean hallway floors by sweeping debris and mopping with appropriate cleaning solutions.
Package Cobs bread items in appropriate bags for distribution and storage.
Clean warehouse floor surfaces by sweeping debris and mopping with appropriate cleaning solutions.
Package Cobs bread items in appropriate bags for distribution and storage.
